import React from 'react' import LogoCompleta from '../images/LogoCompleta.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import LoginContext from '../contexts/LoginContext' import '../styles/Login.css' export default function Login() { const {user, setUser} = LoginContext() return (
setUser(e.target.value)} /> setUser(e.target.value)} />
) }
